attributes.action: Stop Virgin media Limiting bandwidth on there UNLIMITED service during certain hours
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
virgin media have started limiting bandwidth use during certain hours of the day for XL users paying £37 that is a limit of 3gb per day that only 20 minutes of downloads or game play. Then your speed drops making it almost impossible to play xbox live games and download any content as fast as should be. 

The problem is they are selling a product by speed and are not offering this speed at peak times (anywhere from 4pm to 1am)

this seems wrong that they can sell an unlimted service with a advertised 20MB (not UPTO!) and then limit your downloads for upto 12 hours after you have hit 3GB in a day!! 

less for other users.

The ISP's are blaming pirates but as I have clearly shown this is not the case, it is normal useage for todays bandwidth hungry services and it is unacceptable that our service is being degraded

this needs to be looked into and stopped before others follow suit.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
